item.description:
Apparently I'm having an imprompteu meetup tonight; since someone thought this was today and appeared at my doorstop!  So come over if you are around!!

We'll expand to more games if more than 4 people show. 

 

This is a 2-4 player game I still have in shrink wrap, so it's about time I read the directions and play it! If you have experience with it; let me know - I've never played it before, but it looks fun! The back says: "Dare to discover Forbidden Island! Join a team of fearless adventurers on a do-or-die mission to capture four ssacred treasures from the ruins of this perilous paradise. Your team will have to work togethre and make some pulse-pounding maneuvers, as the island will sink beneath every step! Race to collect the treasures and make a triumphant escapte before you are swallowed into the watery abyss!"

group.name: The CardBoard Players Club of Connecticut

item.name: Forbidden Island
